chapters.title: Prologue:  Glimmers of the Pattern
chapters.info:
King Ailron,
      p. 28 (17)—King of Amadicia until
      the Seanchan invaded.  He was not as strong as most kings due to the
      control of the Children of the Light—in fact, he had almost no
      real power at all.  During the invasion, he took his army to engage the
      invaders near Jeramel; they were slaughtered, and Ailron himself was
      captured in what Valda now calls “Ailron's
      Disaster.”
      See also
      Niall, Pedron;
      Valda, Eamon.
